website_summaries.verdict: Kids will stay warm and cozy in this brightly colored rest mat.
pros: Available in a wide range of colors and designs
Mat rolls up with strong hook-and-loop straps for easy travel and storage
Includes flannel blanket and removable pillow
Machine wash safe for front-loading machines
cons: This mat sits at a higher price point than its competitors

customer_reviews.title: If you're undecided on a nap mat. CHOOSE THIS ONE
customer_reviews.text: I read reviews on multiple nap mats and finally decided on this one. Definitely am very satisfied with my decision. It's not like a sleeping bad material, which is a plus in my opinion. It is very soft and cuddly. Easy to roll up. I've washed it 3 times since I've gotten it a week ago and still looks brand new, no color fade. My daughter absolutely loves her nap mat. We purchased the unicorn one. Would definitely reccomend to anyone! There is also a blank pink pocket on front that was perfect to vinyl her name for personalization.
customer_reviews.author: Laken

customer_reviews.title: Great value and lasts!
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd Wildkin nap mat we’ve purchased. I have two kiddos in daycare who use them daily. They are sturdy but comfortable. They are also super easy to wash; the pillow is removeable. We hang dry when we can, but also tumble dry when needed. My 4 year old can roll it up on her own and has been able to for the last year. Our first one lasted just over a year with weekly washings. Other more expensive nap mats we’ve purchased made it far less than a year without falling apart.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda R

customer_reviews.title: Love love love this nap mat!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for naptime at daycare. My almost 2-year-old loves it. She had never slept in anything besides a pack-n-play or a crib. The transition was flawless. I think it’s a little thin, but if it were any thicker, she wouldn’t be able to carry it. It’s the perfect thickness for a toddler. Very glad I ignored the negative reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Bubbles

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but not practical for washing!
customer_reviews.text: It is a great product. Until you wash it! The filling in the blanket side forms into a ball after the first wash. There are no seams in the blanket, like those on a quilt, to prevent the filling from moving inside the blanket. Tried to return it, but there is no replacing option and our daughter loves it. We are stuck with a crumpled blanket that bulges up and can no longer fold to close.
customer_reviews.author: Moonchild1

customer_reviews.title: Our 18 month old loves this bed roll.
customer_reviews.text: Our 18 month old loves this bed roll. She likes to unroll it in the living room and lay on it to watch TV, or line up baby dolls and tuck them in. We recently took it on vacation to use on top of a plain crib mattress at my in-laws and it worked perfectly. It's also nice that it has an outside pocket to tuck her taggie and bink in so everything is together. She should be able to use this until she is 4 or 5 based on size. She curls up and takes up about 1/2 of it.
customer_reviews.author: CooperDog

customer_reviews.title: Disgusting and awful
customer_reviews.text: Okay. I ordered this one in bright red. I received, read the instructions and decided to wash it with baby laundry detergent, in the cold water in the bathtub, no machine wash. I left it for 2 hours in COLD water and see what happened with my bathtub!!!! I cannot clean it with anything( no clorax can help me. What are you using to die the product that a kid supposed to sleep in?! I will wait until it dries, and I will use white t-shirt to check of it dies. If so I will return this mess!!! Disgusting really! It’s not cheap chewing gum to be so died!
customer_reviews.author: Tania

customer_reviews.title: Very rough material. Not good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Loved the look of this nap map when I opened it. Immediately noticed it was very stiff material and not soft. I thought after a few washes it would be better. We have had it for a month and it has been washed 3 times. It is still very hard and rough. It does not wash very well. The material is already getting little fabric balls all over it. The brightness is fading. Very disappointed for the price and after reading other reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Nicky Brown

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the horse mat for my preschooler to yse daily. I love the construction of the mat, from the soft flanel inside the blanket to the extra pocket outside. A big plus was that you don't have to roll it up tight to get the velcro to meet so my 4 year old is able to do it by herself. A couple downsides to this is that her toes stick out of the bottom (she's average hight) and it's a bit thin for school floors so I added the basic foam mat underneath for extra comfort. However, my daughter is extremely happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: C Henry

customer_reviews.title: Stains on the mat
customer_reviews.text: We were excited for the mat that our daughter can bring to her preschool. However when we opened it there were two visible stains, one with red and yellow (who knows what that is) and the other one with a pen streak. I contacted the customer service with pictures but no response.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn J. Barron

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Mommys/Daddy’s of Pre-K/Kindergarten students!
customer_reviews.text: Let me just say this is a PERFECT Pre-K- Kindergarten nap/quiet time mat. It was a little pricey but worth it and I do not regret it one bit. I’ve washed on the delicate cycle and dryed on the delicate cycle about 10-15 times now because they get sent home every Friday to be cleaned. The pillow is not deformed which I was afraid of and it still has its shape. It’s also awesome that my little girl can hold it herself into class. I will definitely recommend this to every mommy/daddy of a Pre-K/Kindergarten student.
customer_reviews.author: Kris L

customer_reviews.title: Worth the buy in the end.
customer_reviews.text: The pillow fell apart in the washer the first wash. It was very poorly made! Thankfully I had another pillow we could use because her first day of school was the next morning. It was a mess to clean up in my washer and dryer and from the other linen that was washed with it. The actual sleep sack seems to be good quality fabric but there is minimal padding. I love the handle on it and how it rolls up making it very convenient when your hands are full. The pocket on it is really pointless, it is too small and whatever put in it could fall right out.
customer_reviews.author: ashley shields

customer_reviews.title: Cute but smells awful.
customer_reviews.text: OK, so we bought this because our daughter needed a sleep mat for pre-school. Ever since it arrived - and came out of the package - it has had an "herby" smell to it. We tried airing it out. Washing it. Spraying it with Febreeze. Nothing will get rid of the smell. I'm honestly afraid to send her back to school with it because I don't want her teachers to think we partake in extra curricular activities. So, it's cute. It's a sleep mat. It serves its purpose. Maybe we got a weird one, I don't know. The smell is awful and so strong.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Great for cots at daycare!
customer_reviews.text: We’ve had the mermaid one for 2 years and my daughter has used it daily at school. It’s so easy to take back and forth and folds up nicely. We got the horse one for my youngest daughter and it’s really nice and thick. The material is a bit scratchy but I think the mermaid one is soft because we have washed it over time. We had the first one dry cleaned a couple times but it was like $17 so now we just wash it in the washer on delicate and let it air dry and it works well for us. Definitely recommend for cots at daycare.
customer_reviews.author: ColdBrewLoveJenny

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Ok so let me first say thank god it's long enough. That's what I was afraid of. My child is 3.5 yrs old. And it fits perfect. I would have liked for it to be longer bc shes growing and the School year just started. Soft medium thickness. I give it a 4/5. Colors and design is beautiful. Length is the only thing I wished it was longer. Blanket is great covers here with extra room. Pillow soft. But one of the top ranked brands.
customer_reviews.author: Kim j

customer_reviews.title: Not as thick as one from Wildkin website
customer_reviews.text: I was a really disappointed when I received this. My older daughter has an original Nap mat purchased directly from Wildkin, and it is much thicker. I originally bought the modern nap mat with straps for a cot, but returned it because it was too thin. I figured this one would be the exact quality of the one my older daughter has. Not sure if Wildkin changed the product, or the Amazon one just isn’t the same quality.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed- "pills" and unraveling at seams
customer_reviews.text: The nap mat is cute and my 18 month old was super excited about it. Unfortunately right out of the package it had threads unraveling at the seams. It also washed terribly. I washed it tonight for the first time on gentle cycle, and the material "pilled" and some of the shuffling bunched up. I would understand if she had been using this for a while. But we just got it today. I'm very disappointed as I had high hopes for this mat.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Quality mat, but scratchy material
customer_reviews.text: High quality nap mat for daycare, however, wish it were softer. I was surprised how the material was quite rough and scratchy. Even after a month of washing, it still hasn’t softened. We have one nap mat from another brand, Stephen Joseph, that we’ve had for 2+ years and has always had the softest material. Wish I had bought that brand again instead, however, was trying to save a little $$ since I needed multiple nap mats this time around. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great Nap Mat For MDO/Preschool
customer_reviews.text: This mat is comfortable enough for my daughter to nap at her MDO program, even though she doesn't always love napping away from home. It folds up nicely and is easily carried by the strap along with other school gear. Huge plus that it is machine washable but be warned that it is air dry only and takes a while to fully dry out. Definitely wash at least a full day in advance of when you need to use it to avoid a wet nap!
customer_reviews.author: Caleb Dragna

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I have twin girls and my wife is a stay at home mom. It’s hard trying to get them down for a nap when they both get sleepy at the same time. I got these little mats because they spend majority of their time on the floor playing and my wife spends her time there too with them. It’s easier to lay them down on the floor on these little cute mats than to have to potiwntially way a sleeping baby to put them in their cribs. They take two naps on these every day and they love it. They also watch Sesame Street in the morning while wrapped in the blanket
customer_reviews.author: Happy customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this product, our preschooler has been using it for her nap time at school and even the teachers compliment how easy it is for her to fold up and store in her cubby. We bought this last year and she’s using it for the second year in preschool, colors have faded a little bit but I’ve been washing it every Friday over over a year so it’s to be expected, still looks great though, no tears, good quality material, her teachers are happy, we’re happy, our 4 year old is happy, would definitely purchase again
customer_reviews.author: Andre Komene

customer_reviews.title: Not really soft
customer_reviews.text: Decided on this due to cute print and size of mat. The print was cute & well made and fit my 4 year old daughter perfectly but the only reason we returned it was due to the main material. Product description indicated cotton/microfiber.?? The lined portion of the blanket was super soft but the other parts of the mat was really uncomfortable. My daughter called it “scratchy & itchy” and wouldn’t lay on it. So if your child isn’t picky and certain fabrics don’t bother them, then this would be a perfect mat for pre-k and kindergarten.
customer_reviews.author: PG

customer_reviews.title: Thinner than what I expected
customer_reviews.text: The material and quality of the mat isn’t what I expected... it’s a bit more thin and there’s a lot of lose strings coming out. The pillow is very soft and comfortable and for a toddler this would work just fine to sleep on. I just wish the material was a bit thicker and higher quality for the price I paid. Other than that I’m crossing my fingers this survives the washing machine!
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Not that soft and overpriced
customer_reviews.text: It’s very cute, well made and rolls up well. The bottom has just enough padding and so does the pillow. The entire thing is the same material, which is like a kind of cheap comforter material. I was hoping the blanket part would have been a little cozier. I also think it’s insanely overpriced and is worth maybe $30 or so. Nevertheless, my 2 year old loves it so that’s what matters.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley M.

customer_reviews.title: A bit rough...
customer_reviews.text: It seems well made and provides adequate cushion. However, the paisley material is pretty rough, even after washing. It almost feels like an outdoor fabric. I'm hoping the pillow doesn't irritate my daughter's sensitive skin. The inside of the "blanket" is flannel. But it's not soft by any means. Maybe it will soften up after a few washings. Will update this review in a few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Freeland

customer_reviews.title: great quality.
customer_reviews.text: perfect napmat for my kiddo. its thick so I don't have to worry about her being uncomfortable. the pillow is removable for washing. also, some reviews have had issues with the mat after washing. I personally have not. it washes fine on regular cycle, I dry it in the dryer halfway, & hang dry to finish drying it. the stuffing has never bunched up, no fading, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke T.

customer_reviews.title: Fourth Sleep Mat and Love Them!
customer_reviews.text: Always buy this brand for sleep mats as they last forever! Take the pillow out when you wash! They may fade a bit depending on the pattern but you can wash it and it maintains the quality! Trust me some sleep mats come apart at the seams and lose it’s shape. This mat is not one of them. I have bought four of them one for each of my kids and as a present as well!
customer_reviews.author: Lana Barry

customer_reviews.title: Such a cute mat...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great design...with built in pillow AND blanket. My granddaughter LOVED it and was ready to lie down for a nap almost immediately. Granted, she had had a busy Christmas day, but I was quite surprised at how excited she was for her "sleeping bag" considering it's not your typical "toy" gift. The mat seems to be great quality...time will confirm.
customer_reviews.author: Janice C

customer_reviews.title: Cute, Comfy, and Durable
customer_reviews.text: This is actually my second Nap Mat from Wildkin's. The first I bought in 2009 for my oldest who used it for like 5 years. Now my younger son currently using it. The only thing that seems to be wearing out is the velcro but it still holds. This one seems softer and thicker than the older one. I like these because they provide some cushion on the bottom. Hopefully this one will last just as long. I definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sarge

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I read a lot of reviews before buying this one for my 3 years old preschool. This one was the perfect choice when you consider price, looks, and functionality. It is very soft and my daughter learned how to fold it herself after we showed her just one time. She loves it and wants to nap in it at home as well.
customer_reviews.author: Miro Bashev

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Not very long and definitely not soft! Cute pattern and Nice because you don’t have to send a blanket but the pillow is very small. Not worth the price for me. I returned and bought one half the price and I’m way more satisfied thAn with this one
customer_reviews.author: JamieRee

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: The material is not soft at all. The pillow is over-stuffed, but the nap mat isn’t stuffed enough. It is very thin to think about a child lying down on the floor on it. The pattern is very cute though. I would return it but it’s the second name brand I’ve tried. They’re all probably like that.
customer_reviews.author: Bird201

customer_reviews.title: Daily use for daycare
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my 2 yr old to use at daycare. I like that the pillow and blanket are all in one and it's easy to remove the pillow and put it in washing machine. Air dries very quickly which is a huge plus. The padding is decent but I thought the fabric on the blanket could be a little softer. Overall I'm happy with it and my daughter uses it everyday at school. Will see if it lasts long enough for my 2nd kid.
customer_reviews.author: Rita K.

customer_reviews.title: Thinner than expected and color doesn't match
customer_reviews.text: Overall, this is a good purchase. The inside of the "blanket" portion is not the bolder shade of blue, but the same light blue as the background of the mat. My daughter will be using this at school on top of a "kinder mat", otherwise it would be too thin for her to be comfortable on the school floor during nap time. She really likes it and it is the perfect length for now (she is 37.5"). The one star deduction is for the thin bottom layer and the image not matching the product (light blue blanket instead of the darker shade shown).
customer_reviews.author: daw

customer_reviews.title: washes terribly
customer_reviews.text: every time we wash this nap mat, the batting in the blanket bunches up and becomes very lumpy. I spend 15min at least pulling it apart and attempting to even it out in the blanket, which is never fully successful. The print is cute and it is decently soft. I expected more.
customer_reviews.author: dani

customer_reviews.title: Cute and useful for a toddler
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my 3 year old to use. Hes pretty tall for his age (42in) and its still an ok size for him but if your child is much taller than that this probably isnt the best choice. Inside of the blanket part is soft, pillow is a nice feature and it rolls up easy and has a carry handle. Overall its a good product. I havent washed it yet so not sure how it will hold up to that.
customer_reviews.author: TheScoob

customer_reviews.title: It’s not as plush as you think it would be.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a backup for the Jump off Jo napmat I already have for my daughter. However the construction isn’t as plush and the “fleece” blanket is hardly thick enough to be called that. It’s still convenient to have as a back up but if you’re looking for a nap mat comfortable enough to use on the floor, this isn’t it. On a nap cot, sure but nothing else.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica L. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Lots of patterns to choose from
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the butterfly pattern which was on backorder, it arrived today but is the wrong pattern (dinosaur). Too lazy to return. Havent washed it yet so not sure how durable it is. Will update. The kids think it's quite comfy. Thicker mat and pillow than expected. Very comforter like blanket.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah A.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t match photo
customer_reviews.text: Received this today, doesn’t match photo of what I purchased at all. Pillow not attached, no cushion type sections on bottom. Looks like a home made sleeping bag, my 4 yr old opened it and loves it so I can’t send it back, would be sending it back and getting the one in picture if she hadn’t seen it. Disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: allison

customer_reviews.title: Great mat/ short velcro straps
customer_reviews.text: This mat is really safe, good quality and soft, my 4 year old loves it. The only reason I give it 4 stars is because the 2 velcro straps used to close the mat after rolling it are too short for a small child. An adult has the strenght to roll the mat really tide so that the velcro straps close in place. How ever for a small child that has to roll their own mat in preschool its nearly impossible. I had to take the mat to the simstress and extend the straps so my daugther could roll and close the mat on her own.
customer_reviews.author: Moon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and worth the $$
customer_reviews.text: My kids love these sleeping bags/nap mats for daycare. I bring them home weekly to wash and no issues. My son has had his for about 2 1/2 years and my daughters about 6 months. Super easy to wash. Pillow is removable I wash them and throw them in the dryer as well. Usually I bring them home Friday to wash and my kids love them so much they use them all weekend in the living room for naps or movie nights! Worth the $$
customer_reviews.author: Brent Seidl

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased with lunch bag and book bag with same design. SOOOO cute, compliments when my little one attends daycare, and very durable. Not thick, but thinly padded. Little one sleeps on a daycare cot with this on top, so it works. Pillow really helps her feel at home and not like just sleeping on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Mona Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: This mat works perfectly for our girl to sleep on at daycare. The outer material is not soft, but the inside of the blanket is flannel so it's a little softer. It's really easy to fold and washer/dryer safe so easy to clean. It's also just really cute. It seems really durable as well. Would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: AUCharger

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and easy to clean!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this! I was so nervous because she outgrew her pack n play for naps at her nanny's. From the first day on she slept in this with no problems!! It's comfortable and easy to clean (she had had some accidents in it unfortunately). Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Christine B.

customer_reviews.title: Kid loves it. Material is terrible quality.
customer_reviews.text: My 19mo was having issues sleeping. We wanted to transition out of a walker sleep suit and this seemed like a good option. We put it in her crib and she loves it. The quality of the cotton is pretty poor. It pills easily and it’s just rough to the touch. She likes it, so I’m giving it a 4. Hope to use when we travel.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia N

customer_reviews.title: Small size
customer_reviews.text: The fabric is a little rough, I hope after the first wash it will become softer. Easy to fold. In general, I am satisfied with the set, one comment, I think the size of the bed is small. My daughter is 4 years old, I think the sleeping bag will be enough for her for 1 year.
customer_reviews.author: Mariia

customer_reviews.title: Great product for little ones!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it! It even has a little place to put her name, we used HTV and heat pressed her name on it. I love that the blanket is wider than the cot so it covers her completely. Pillow seems nice and fluffy/firm. Rolls up easily. She is so excited to take it to camp.
customer_reviews.author: T. Walton

customer_reviews.title: Love it buy it and kids can be the judge ...
customer_reviews.text: MY daughter absolutely loves it. It’s really soft in the inside. Some teachers though may have an issue with it since it’s big and it won’t fit in their cubby. Most likely will sleep on the floor with it. But it’s cushioned enough so I don’t mind. There isn’t a place where you can write their name but i just wrote it on the straps. It is what it is. Love it buy it and kids can be the judge of it. Mine approves :) oh and she’s tall!
customer_reviews.author: Lilimoon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Preschoolers
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my daughter for nap time at preschool. The teachers said they like these because it's easy for the kids to setup and roll back up with little assistance. She loves it so far. The fabric is a little stiff, but should be easy to wipe down and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Holman

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Material - Scratchy
customer_reviews.text: Super excited to try this for traveling with our little one. It does fold up very small and neatly and has decent cushion for the size however the material this thing is made from is SO SCRATCHY! There’s no way they could be comfortable enough to sleep. Returned right away.
customer_reviews.author: RLue

customer_reviews.title: Worth the investment for multiple years!
customer_reviews.text: So great for my 2 year old to take to kids day out! Light weight for her to carry when she wants to be independent. Soft and warm. The pattern is still bright and beautiful after almost a year of use and plenty of time in the washing machine! It does have a small chocolate stain I can’t get out but it’s not a big deal to me. Still in great condition for next year!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: I love this mat for its thickness and softness BUT after one wash there’s now a hole where the pillowcase attaches to the mat. Very disappointed ☹️
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Beard

customer_reviews.title: Scratchy Material
customer_reviews.text: This product is definitely overpriced at $40. I should have purchased the microfiber mat when it was $25 a couple months ago. The material is very scratchy even after washing. Hopefully it will soften up after a few washes.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Not as described
customer_reviews.text: Item that arrived was not a nap mat, it was a sleeping bag.
customer_reviews.author: Jkarp

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for my 2 year old
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this napmat for my 25 month old. I was it every other week due to it being placed on the floor at her Mother’s Day out program. It’s washed well and held up nicely. The pillow is removable so it’s great for washing. There’s plenty of room to grow. The fabric is perfect for vinyl personalization.
customer_reviews.author: NJ

customer_reviews.title: Nice mat for school
customer_reviews.text: After several months of use so far at my daughter's school, this is holding up pretty well. They send it home periodically to have me wash it. It's easy to clean. I love that it rolls up nicely and has handles. That makes it taking it back and forth to school easy. The only thing I've found is from her laying on it it gets those little fuzzy balls on it.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Lee

customer_reviews.title: Should have gotten this the first time.
customer_reviews.text: We upgraded from my daughter’s original nap mat. I love that the pillow is removable so it doesn’t bunch up in the wash and the quilted cover is much softer and warmer than her previous mat. The handle is also handy when she carries everything out of the classroom for the weekend.
customer_reviews.author: Darcy Lynne Jamison

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: My toddler loves this nap mat. I’m on the fence about it. The fabric has pilled very quickly after a couple washes, and the softness isn’t the best. I also do not like that I have to air dry it. I wish I had purchased something that I could throw in the dryer.
customer_reviews.author: Dr.Karie

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 1yr old and 3 year old. They both fit in it with extra wiggle room. They love it! It’s so lightweight and easy to handle, my 3yr ole can fold and unfold it on her own. The fabric is soft and the small pillow is fluffy
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: If the bed and blankets are pieces like this: [ ] then I recommend getting a ...
customer_reviews.text: My toddler daughter loves this for preschool days, and I do too. The only one suggestion I have is running a sewing machine across the material a couple of times to 'lock' the stuffing into the general area it needs to be in. After a wash it can bunch up down one end and essentially be impossible to get back to normal. If the bed and blankets are pieces like this: [ ] then I recommend getting a sewing machine to do *this* to both bed and blanket: [ | | | ]
customer_reviews.author: Andre C

customer_reviews.title: Cute but wasn’t worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Very cute but better off just using a blanket. I got this for my daughter when she goes to daycare but it always just got messed up always wanted to get up and fix it. She didn’t like using it maybe if it was a little bigger but ended up wanting me to get her a blanket.
customer_reviews.author: Marcy

customer_reviews.title: Ehh
customer_reviews.text: Over all my 4 year old daughter absolutely loves this nap mat. I on the other hand think the price isn’t worth the product. It’s poorly made and the unicorn fabric is a little itchy feeling the fleece underneath the blanket is soft. It’s very thin and my daughter takes up the whole mat top to bottom with no room to grow. Maybe she’s taller than most kids her age idk but like I said she loves it so I’m good I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: It's super cute but the bottom has very little padding/ stuffing on the bottom. I would say it's great for on a cot only but not if the child will be napping on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda V

customer_reviews.title: 2nd one!
customer_reviews.text: We got one of these 2 years ago for my son, and it’s still in great shape and he still loves it. So, we just got one for sister too! We tried a frozen one off amazon first, and the quality was just nothing like these.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Too short for my 3yr old
customer_reviews.text: Love design and product quality but too short for my 3 yr old! Waste of money for us.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Sunflower

customer_reviews.title: Warm and comfy.
customer_reviews.text: Cute and love the handle. If you were so inclined it has an outside pocket you could monogram. It’s warm my little one has to take her shorts or pants off at preschool to nap comfortable if it’s warm outside. Easy to wash as she wet it the very first day of use 🤷🏼‍♀️ Have many compliments on it.
customer_reviews.author: AbcH

customer_reviews.title: We love this nap mat
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for about 2 and a half months now. My daughter takes it to preschool for nap time, so it's used everyday and it's still practically new. It's also easy enough for her to roll up and put away herself, which I really like. It's been washed once a week since Ive bought it and nothing has torn or shifted out of place. I will definitely be buying another one when my other daughter starts preschool 😁
customer_reviews.author: Tyler J.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and cute design
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has used this napping mat for over a year and it still looks great! I wash it weekly and it has very minimal fading. I remove the pillow insert (as recommended) and clean in washing machine and into dryer easily. My daughter is a bit tall, but still fits fine under the cover. It rolls up and velcro closes with easy shoulder strap. It's a winner!
customer_reviews.author: E Lu

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: This mat is great! I have had it about a week, and washed it so I could get a sense of how it would hold up. Some other reviewers mentioned "pilling," but I did not have this experience because I followed the instructions on the label. Just wash in cold water on gentle. I hung the mat over the bathroom shower bar and it dried overnight. The temperatures have been cold (lows of 8-20 degrees and highs of 20-30 degrees, but it still dried quickly. Imagine how much faster it will dry during warmer months. I experienced no pilling at all. I am very pleased with this product and will definitely purchase it again if I ever need to.
customer_reviews.author: drjaj

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! only wish they were a little bit longer ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! only wish they were a little bit longer for taller kids, my baby in in pre-k with 4yrs and her feet are on the edge and blanket does not cover them.
customer_reviews.author: Tania Arroyo

customer_reviews.title: Itchy :(
customer_reviews.text: Nap mat has potential but the material its made out of it so itchy 🥺 I really would like to return it but I’m gonna have to keep it because I don’t have time for my kids school to get another one☹️
customer_reviews.author: summer

customer_reviews.title: Preschool Must!
customer_reviews.text: My 43” tall 4.5-year-old LOVES her new sleep mat for preschool. We wash on gentle and hang dry and have had absolutely no wear/ balling of the product. Definitely glad I purchased! This should get her through to age 5 as well.
customer_reviews.author: PsychStudent

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Day Care Naps!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect size and level of comfiness for my 1 year old who uses this for naps at day care. It has a built in pillow and is easy to roll up. I secure all velcro strips and throw this thing in the washer for an easy clean. Highly recommend for a comfy nap time bed!
customer_reviews.author: Mahlisa

customer_reviews.title: Cute, durable and comfy
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my daughter to use at preschool a couple of months ago. It is well-made and washes well. I put it in the dryer, even though it says not to. The velcro straps keep a tight roll. When shopping for these online, I was concerned about softness of the fabric (I think we have all bought cheap, scratchy sheets.), and this is soft and comfy. She even likes to nap on it at home on weekends.
customer_reviews.author: suertelou

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and does not fade
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, I love 💕 horses 🐎 and my daughter does too, vibrant print and colors set in a pretty pink fabric, the color doesn’t fade after washing. I think it’s amazing, I received a lot of compliments from the teachers and other mothers at the school
customer_reviews.author: Carmella A

customer_reviews.title: My toddler loves this nap mat
customer_reviews.text: We got this nap mat for my daughter to take to school and it's perfect. She loves it and plays with it all the time. Sometimes she will even lay on it at home. We got the llama print and it's adorable too!
customer_reviews.author: ndnat

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with the purchase so far. My daughter (4) will use it in pre k when she starts in September. She loves it. I saw many making complaints about the Velcro not being long enough but that must have been an issue they fixed as I haven't had an issue. I also found a used on just like this at a consignment a week later that I bought for my 2 year old because they kept fighting for it and the Velcro had definitely been extended. The blanket is also very soft on the inside!!! I love that!
customer_reviews.author: Jill Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Wouldn’t call it a mat. It’s like laying on the straight floor with a thin blanket . No cushion expect for the pillow. Disappointed for sure !!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Scotty Martin

customer_reviews.title: perfect for daycare!
customer_reviews.text: my little one promoted up to the toddlers room and needed sheets for her cot at daycare. i went with this option so i didn't have to mess with separate sheets and it works perfectly. baby sleeps in it at daycare and it's perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: I received this in the mail with hair all over the velcro straps and a piece of popcorn inside the mat. Besides those obviously disgusting things, the mat itself is not soft. Don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: Carlos del Rio

customer_reviews.title: Cute but fades like crazy after one wash
customer_reviews.text: I hate to not love this mat. I biggest issue is that after one wash it looked 10 years old. My daughter loves it and it seems so soft and perfect for preschool but when you have to wash it every week it just concerns me that it won’t hold up. I’ve seen other kids and they all look horrible so I know I’m not alone. For the price I would expect a little one then a one time use look.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: The longer Velcro tabs are perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love this May better than other brands out there. I’ve bought 2 other before this one and it’s an upgrade. The longer Velcro tabs are ideal. Hopefully they last longer than the competition Velcro tabs. But I do realize, it’s velcro. Fabric is perfect for daycares and easy to roll up. Love the print and construction quality is wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Zorn

customer_reviews.title: good buy
customer_reviews.text: Like the removable pillow. The mats with built in pillows eventually get messed up in the washer. This is good quality mat. Will buy again in a few years once it's worn out. Its soft, perfect thickness, and warm . Washed well and holds shape.
customer_reviews.author: Shaina

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this nap mat. I wish it were a little thicker and a little softer, but she says it's fine. It took longer than anticipated to receive, and then when it did arrive, we needed to sign for it at delivery.
customer_reviews.author: LLB

customer_reviews.title: Nap mat
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 4 year old granddaughter to use for nap time and she absolutely loves it. It’s easy for her to carry, it’s easy to wash and dry. She practiced rolling it up before she took it to school and it only took a couple of times and she could roll it up on her own. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: P Cook

customer_reviews.title: Love love love the fairies and butterfly blanket!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing quality! Beautiful, functional and my daughter's favorite way to relax. Used as a kindermat at mother's day out. Folds easily and washes well. My daughter is 3 years old in 4t with a good 6inches if room left to grow and still use. Excellent for travel.
customer_reviews.author: Horsecrazy

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 2-year-old to take to daycare, and it's the perfect size for her. The blanket extends a little farther beyond the mat itself, so she's covered well (in addition to her regular blanket she takes). It's soft, easy to clean, and the pillow removes for easy washing.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: I’m so so disappointed in this
customer_reviews.text: I’m so so disappointed in this! I bought one from Olive kids a couple years back and it was great. I bought another for my daughter and the padding is half of what the one we own is. The material is also a lot tougher and poor quality. Do not buy!
customer_reviews.author: Arni Steingrimsson

customer_reviews.title: Cute designs, easy to travel, quality material
customer_reviews.text: Goof quality mat. Removable pillow for easy cleaning. Rolls up for the easy traveling. Works best on top of a plushy surface like carpet or a mattress though. I think it's not as plushy as could be but kids don't seem bothered by it.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra

customer_reviews.title: Easy for my toddler to use.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and pack up and store! It hangs up in our closet and is used for nap times or if we travel and we need her to sleep on the ground when there’s no bed.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffani

customer_reviews.title: Wildkin original nap mat, purple unicorn pattern
customer_reviews.text: The mat is so cute and well made so far! My little uses it at school for nap time and was so happy when we upgraded to this mat. She loves the removable pillow and the bright pattern. She no longer cries before nap time because she “is happy comfy” now as she says. Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: These are AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: This has worked out SO well for my twins for daycare and for napping at home also. I have found this to be so much easier than those plastic nap mats that are bulky and having to slide the slip covers off and on. I pull the pillow out once a week and throw the whole thing in my washer and dryer. It has held up perfectly and we’ve used them everyday for about 7-9 months. Well made and excellent price. My twins love these! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Duhon

customer_reviews.title: Better than a sleeping bag!
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty. Material isn't as soft as I would like it to be for a nap mat. Also need to wash in industrial sized washer which is inconvenient. My 4 year old daughter loves it though. She doesn't like to sleep in sleeping bags because she gets hot. With this she can use the blanket if she wants or at least stick her leg out.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Treena

customer_reviews.title: Fabric is very rough
customer_reviews.text: The fabric is definitely NOT soft as described. It’s very rough. I would not want to sleep on this, so will not make my kiddo sleep on it. After reading reviews that it does not improve after washing, I am returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie L

customer_reviews.title: Perhaps this is bad advice, but it says to wash in a ...
customer_reviews.text: 3 year old loves it and had no issues sleeping in it the first time she tried. Perhaps this is bad advice, but it says to wash in a front-loading, commercial washer and then air dry; we washed in a top-loading washing on delicate and then dried in our drier on low heat and had no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Y

customer_reviews.title: Very well made
customer_reviews.text: We bought this napmap for our 3 year old during preschool. She's now 6, and still lays on it! It has lasted us through 2 years of preschool and a year of Kindergarten! This napmat is very well made, and has held up beautifully through weekly washing. The pillow is not flat, and there is enough padding to be comfortable, but not so much that my child cannot roll it up on her own. Occasionally, I use a sweater shaver on it to keep pilling down.
customer_reviews.author: K A

customer_reviews.title: Price and quality
customer_reviews.text: Plz buy it! I like this thing so so much my 5 year old daughter loves it she says it’s nice . I did lot of research and finally ask my hubby to get it . Thanks to amazon
customer_reviews.author: Sovika

customer_reviews.title: Great school nap mat
customer_reviews.text: I feel like I read 100 reviews trying to decide on a nap mat for my daughter. I really like the soft fabric and ease of rolling this mat up (my 2 year old can do it on her own). I machine wash and gentle and hang to dry weekly. 6 weeks in, I can see some piling on the inside which is a bummer but I still recommend this mat. My daughter loves the design and takes a great nap at daycare!
customer_reviews.author: PrimA

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my 3yo
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect nappie for my 3 yer old preschooler. It is soft, excellent quality and easily rolls and unrolls. It is of course more bulky than the yoga mat style of nappie so if you are looking for that size then do not go with this. It is about the size of a small sleeping bag.
customer_reviews.author: Southern Charm

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad we purchased this one it lasted even after being washed every week! Would absolutely recommend and has a blank pocket if you wanted to have it monogrammed!
customer_reviews.author: Savanna

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: My 4 yr old used this daily at preschool. We wash every werk very easy to clean. I had another one that lasted a year. We worth tge money my daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra

product_meta.title: Wildkin Original Nap Mat with Pillow for Toddler Boys and Girls, Measures 50 x 20 x 1.5 Inches, Ideal for Daycare and Preschool, Mom's Choice Award Winner, BPA-Free, Olive Kids (Paisley)
product_meta.description:
Color:PaisleyDrifting off to sleep during nap time is a breeze when your child is snuggled up in Wildkin’s Original Nap Mat. Each Nap Mat measures 50 x 20 x 1.5 inches and is perfectly sized for keeping your little one cozy. Wildkin’s Original Nap Mat is made from a super soft blend of cotton and polyester materials. The attached blanket is lined with 100% cotton flannel to keep your little one extra warm. Each Nap Mat features a roll-up design, complete with elastic hook and loop fastening straps and a convenient carrying handle. Its travel-friendly design makes it easy for your little one to take their Nap Mat to-and-from school, sleepovers, and more. 

Each Original Nap Mat was designed to coordinate with other Wildkin gear. From lunch boxes, to duffel bags, to backpacks, your child will love having their favorite designs with them on-the-go. 

Remove pillow before washing. Wash in commercial front-loading machine in cold water on gentle cycle. Hang to dry. Do not store unless dry. Spot clean pillow only. Do not store pillow or put pillow into nap mat sleeve unless dry. 

90-day manufacturer's warranty against defects - normal wear-and-tear, and misuse excluded. Rigorously tested to ensure that all parts are lead-safe, bpa-free, phthalate-free, and conform to all rules and regulations set forth by the Consumer Products Safety Commission. 

Not intended for outdoor use.
feature_bullets: SNOOZE HAPPY - Drifting off to sleep during nap time is a breeze when your child is snuggled up in Wildkin's Original Nap Mat for toddlers boys and girls. Each Nap Mat measures 50 x 1.5 x 20 inches and is perfectly sized for keeping your little one cozy. Between its eye-catching patterns and super comfy design, your little one won't want to sleep without their new favorite sleep mat or nap mats. This can also be used in school as daycare nap mat.

SUPER SOFT - Wildkin's Original Kids Nap Mat is made from a super soft blend of cotton and polyester materials. The attached blanket is lined with 100% cotton flannel to keep your little one extra warm. Whether they're cuddled up on their cot for a happy napper snooze or hunkered down in the living room for a blanket-fort campout. This Nap Mat is sure to keep your child ultra-comfy a perfect kids nap mat with pillow and blanket.

TRAVEL FRIENDLY DESIGN - Naptime can happen anywhere with Wildkin's Original Kids Sleeping Mat or Nap Mat! Each toddlers, boys and girls nap mat features a roll-up design, complete with elastic hook and loop fastening straps and a convenient carrying handle. Its travel-friendly design makes it easy for your little one to take their Nap Mat to-and-from school, sleepovers and more.

VIBRANT COLORS THAT LAST - Accidents happen, which is why we made our Original Nap Mat easy to clean so your child can get back to snoozing! Just remove the included pillow and place your Nap Mat in a front-loading washer in cold water on a gentle cycle and hang to dry. Our vibrant colors were made to last, so you don't have to worry that they'll fade after washing.

PATTERN COORDINATES WITH OTHER WILDKIN AND OLIVE KIDS ITEMS - Make a theme out of it! Each Original Nap Mat sheet was designed to coordinate with other Wildkin gear and Olive Kids items. From lunch boxes, to duffel bags, to backpacks, your child will love having their favorite designs with them on-the-go specially when use as napping mat anywhere and on travel naptime mat.
